text: Athaba tomara ki bibecana karo ye tomara behesate dakhila hate parabe yataksana na tomadera upare'o tomadera age yara gata hayeche tadera n'yaya na bartaya? Tadera akramana karechila daruna biparyaya ebam carama durdasa, ara tara kempechila, sesa paryanta rasula o tamra sange yara imana enechila tara balale -- ''allah‌ra sahayya kakhana?’’ Allah‌ra sahayya abasya'i nikatabarti naya ki
